mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_SEQ, N.NOTICE_YN, N.NOTICE_NAME, N.NOTICE_CNT, U.USER_NAME, N.USER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(N.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT FROM CAR_NOTICE N, USER_INFO U WHERE N.USER_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY N.NOTICE_YN, N.REG_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_SEQ, NOTICE_YN, NOTICE_NAME, NOTICE_CONTENTS, NOTICE_CNT, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT ) VALUES( (SELECT NULLIF (MAX(A.NOTICE_SEQ),0)+1 FROM CAR_NOTICE A), #{notice_yn}, #{notice_name}, #{notice_contents}, 0, #{user_id}, SYSDATE(), #{user_id}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_SEQ, N.NOTICE_YN, N.NOTICE_NAME, N.READ_CNT, U.USER_NAME, N.USER_ID, NOTICE_CONTENTS, DATE_FORMAT(N.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT FROM CAR_NOTICE N, USER_INFO U WHERE N.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND N.NOTICE_SEQ = #{notice_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE CAR_NOTICE SET READ_CNT = READ_CNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{notice_seq}
UPDATE CAR_NOTICE SET NOTICE_NAME = #{notice_name}, NOTICE_YN = #{notice_yn}, NOTICE_CONTENTS = #{notice_contents}, CHG_ID = #{user_id}, CHG_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{notice_seq}
